works.description:
The picture on the page above is a  
photoshopped picture of myself to which a swastika has been added.

The original unphotoshopped image was stolen from my personal property by 

my ex-wife who scanned it and passed it around to those who seek to harm
me.

This image remains my sole copyright of the Claimant, even in its
digitally  
altered format. See Temple Island Collections Ltd v New English Teas Ltd &
 
Anor [2012] EWPCC 1 (12 January 2012), for a ruling in this regard.

The use of this image therefore constitutes a flagrant and obvious breach 

of my copyright.
